overview: Looney Tunes - After Dark a compilation of 14 classic Looney Cartoons on laserdisc Jumpin Jupiter ~ Water , Water Every Hare ~ Bewitched Bunny ~ Hyde and Hare~ The Night of the Living Duck ~ Transylvania 6-5000 ~ The Wearing of the Grin ~ Scaredy Cat ~ Broom-stick Bunny ~ Hyde & Go Tweet ~ Hare-way to the Stars ~ The Abominable Snow Rabbit ~ The Duxorcist ~ Hasty Hare
title: Looney Tunes: After Dark
